summary_md: Austria, in the year 2024, has a GDP per capita of 45,562 USD per person (NY.GDP.PCAP.KD), with an inflation rate of 2.94% (FP.CPI.TOTL.ZG), and an unemployment rate of 5.44% (SL.UEM.TOTL.ZS). The average life expectancy is 81.54 years years (SP.DYN.LE00.IN), and internet usage stands at 94.90% (IT.NET.USER.ZS). The country's export growth is at 56.92% (NE.EXP.GNFS.ZS).

sections.economy_md: Austria's economy is characterized by a GDP per capita of 45,562 USD per person (NY.GDP.PCAP.KD), with an export growth rate of 56.92% (NE.EXP.GNFS.ZS).
sections.labor_md: The labor market in Austria shows an unemployment rate of 5.44% (SL.UEM.TOTL.ZS), indicating a relatively stable employment environment.
sections.digital_md: Internet penetration in Austria is significant, with usage at 94.90% (IT.NET.USER.ZS), reflecting a well-connected digital infrastructure.
sections.health_env_md: The health environment in Austria is robust, with an average life expectancy of 81.54 years years (SP.DYN.LE00.IN).

job_seeker: Austria's stable employment environment with an unemployment rate of 5.44% (SL.UEM.TOTL.ZS) may offer opportunities for job seekers.
The country's GDP per capita of 45,562 USD per person (NY.GDP.PCAP.KD) suggests a strong economy with potential job growth.
entrepreneur: Austria's significant internet usage at 94.90% (IT.NET.USER.ZS) provides a conducive environment for digital entrepreneurship.
The country's export growth rate of 56.92% (NE.EXP.GNFS.ZS) indicates a favorable market for business expansion.
digital_nomad: With an internet usage rate of 94.90% (IT.NET.USER.ZS), Austria is suitable for digital nomads seeking connectivity and remote work opportunities.
The stable economic conditions, reflected by the GDP per capita of 45,562 USD per person (NY.GDP.PCAP.KD), support a comfortable lifestyle for digital nomads.
expat_family: Austria's high life expectancy of 81.54 years years (SP.DYN.LE00.IN) ensures a healthy environment for expat families.
The country's low unemployment rate of 5.44% (SL.UEM.TOTL.ZS) suggests a stable job market for expat spouses or partners.
